com.here.mobility.sdk.demand

Interface DemandClient.RideUpdateListener

  • Enclosing class:
    DemandClient

    public static interface DemandClient.RideUpdateListener
    The listener interface to be implemented by the caller, to get notifications about Ride updates.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void onErrorOccurred(Throwable error)
      Called when an error occurs.
      void onRideLocationChanged(Ride ride, RideLocation location)
      Called when the ride location changes.
      void onRideStatusChanged(Ride ride, RideStatusLog statusLog)
      Called when the ride status changes.

    • Method Detail

      • onRideStatusChanged

        void onRideStatusChanged(Ride ride,
                         RideStatusLog statusLog)
        Called when the ride status changes. Not guaranteed to be called for every change (e.g. when multiple status changes happened very close to each other, or if the network wasn't available). Check the status log to see the complete list of status updates.
        Parameters:
        ride - the updated ride
        statusLog - the status log, contains the new status and a list of all previous statuses

      • onRideLocationChanged

        void onRideLocationChanged(Ride ride,
                           RideLocation location)
        Called when the ride location changes.
        Parameters:
        ride - the updated ride
        location - the new location

      • onErrorOccurred

        void onErrorOccurred(Throwable error)
        Called when an error occurs.
        Parameters:
        error - the error that occurred
